flawed_nl_solution:
After his father gave him 13 biscuits, Randy has 32 + 13 = <<32+13=46>>46 biscuits.
After his mother gave him 15 biscuits, Randy has 46 + 15 = <<46+15=61>>61 biscuits.
After his brother ate 20 of the biscuits. Randy has 61 - 20 = <<61-20=41>>41 biscuits.
#### 41

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 45, not 46. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
